Kassadin.name: Kassadin
Kassadin.title: the Void Walker
Kassadin.lore:
There is a place between dimensions and between worlds. To some it is known as the Outside, to others it is the Unknown. To most, however, it is called the Void. Despite its name, the Void is not an empty place, but rather the home of unspeakable things, horrors not meant for minds of men. Though such knowledge is lost in modern times, there are those who have unwittingly discovered what lies beyond, and they have been unable to turn away. Kassadin is such a creature. He was once a man forced to look upon the face of the Void and forever changed by what he saw. Once a seeker of forbidden knowledge, he discovered that what he sought was something else entirely. He is one of the few that has found his way to forgotten Icathia and lived to tell the tale, following the scant breadcrumbs hidden in ancient texts.

Within a decaying cyclopean city, Kassadin found secrets of the kind that he will never share - secrets that made him quake with fear at the visions of things to come that were thrust upon him. The power of the place threatened to consume him forever, but Kassadin took the only route available to him in order to survive - he let the Void inside him. Miraculously, he was able to overcome the alien urges that went with it, and he emerged as something more than human. Though a part of him died that day, he knows that he must protect Valoran from the things scratching at the door, waiting to get in and visit their torments upon the world. They are only one step away... something to which the appearance of the abomination known as Cho'Gath attests.

If you look upon the Void, you can't put it behind you. If you look upon Kassadin, he is probably already there.
Kassadin.blurb: There is a place between dimensions and between worlds. To some it is known as the Outside, to others it is the Unknown. To most, however, it is called the Void. Despite its name, the Void is not an empty place, but rather the home of unspeakable ...
allytips: Kassadin has multiple item paths; he can go caster via mana and ability power or anti caster with cooldown reduction and Magic Resist.
Kassadin's ultimate has many uses and is on a shorter cooldown than most, use it often.
Try to get the Ancient Golem buff to counteract Riftwalk's increasing mana cost.
enemytips: Kassadin deals mostly magic damage. If he's doing well consider buying magic resist items like Mercury's Treads and Banshee's Veil.
Each time Kassadin consecutively uses Riftwalk, he pays more and more mana.   Keep this in mind as you chase him.
It takes 6 spell casts for Kassadin's slow, Force Pulse, to become castable. If he levels up that ability, judiciously use your own skills while laning against him.

spells.name: Null Sphere
spells.description: Kassadin fires an ethereal bolt of void energy, dealing damage and silencing the target for a duration.
spells.tooltip: Kassadin fires a void bolt, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and silencing the target for {{ e2 }} second(s).

spells.name: Nether Blade
spells.description: Passive: Kassadin's basic attacks restore Mana. The Mana restored is tripled against enemy champions. Active: Kassadin's basic attacks deal additional magic damage.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Kassadin's basic attacks draw energy from the void, restoring {{ e1 }} Mana each hit. If the target is an enemy champion, the Mana restored is tripled to {{ e3 }}.

Active: Kassadin charges his nether blade for {{ e4 }} seconds causing his basic attacks to deal an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: Force Pulse
spells.description: Kassadin draws energy from spells cast in his vicinity. Upon charging up, Kassadin can use Force Pulse to damage and slow enemies in a cone in front of him.
spells.tooltip: Kassadin draws energy from spells cast in his vicinity, gaining a charge whenever a spell is cast near him. Upon reaching 6 charges, Kassadin can use Force Pulse to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slow enemies by {{ e2 }}% for 3 seconds in a cone in front of him.

spells.name: Riftwalk
spells.description: Kassadin teleports to a nearby location dealing damage to nearby enemy units. Multiple Riftwalks in a short period of time cause them to cost additional Mana.  Multiple champion hits with Riftwalks in a short period of time cause them to deal additional damage.
spells.tooltip:
Kassadin teleports to a nearby location dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to surrounding enemy units. Additionally, each subsequent Riftwalk within the next {{ e2 }} seconds costs {{ e5 }} additional Mana and deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) additional damage, stacks up to 10 times.

If Kassadin hits an enemy champion with Riftwalk, it refunds {{ e4 }}% of the cost.

passive.name: Void Stone
passive.description: Kassadin takes 15% reduced magic damage and transforms this damage into bonus attack speed.
